[DQC.US.0043.7488] The concept DebtAndEquitySecuritiesGainLoss is included in the calculation of NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities. This is in the role 241014057 - Disclosure - Condensed Financial Information of Parent (Details). DebtAndEquitySecuritiesGainLoss is a credit balance type concept representing a natural cash outflow in the reconciliation of net income (loss) to NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities. A credit balance type concept should always be assigned a negative one (-1) calculation weight as it is a deduction from net income (loss) to reconcile to NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities. DebtAndEquitySecuritiesGainLoss has been incorrectly provided a positive one (+1) calculation weight in the extension taxonomy. Correct the calculation weight to negative one (-1) and input the value as a positive amount if it is a deduction of a non-cash income or gain, an increase in an asset, or a decrease in a liability. If the value is an add-back of a non-cash expense or loss, decrease in an asset, or an increase in a liability and DebtAndEquitySecuritiesGainLoss is the correct concept, input a negative value. In this case the company has reported the child concept DebtAndEquitySecuritiesGainLoss multiple times with alternative weights.
Rule Element Id:7488 Rule version: 24.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/765207/000076520722000010/0000765207-22-000010-xbrl.zip/fnlc-20211231.htm 4

property.name: label
property.value: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0043.7488] The concept EquityInUnremittedEarningsFromSubsidiary is included in the calculation of NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities. This is in the role 241014057 - Disclosure - Condensed Financial Information of Parent (Details). EquityInUnremittedEarningsFromSubsidiary is a credit balance type concept representing a natural cash outflow in the reconciliation of net income (loss) to NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities. A credit balance type concept should always be assigned a negative one (-1) calculation weight as it is a deduction from net income (loss) to reconcile to NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities. EquityInUnremittedEarningsFromSubsidiary has been incorrectly provided a positive one (+1) calculation weight in the extension taxonomy. Correct the calculation weight to negative one (-1) and input the value as a positive amount if it is a deduction of a non-cash income or gain, an increase in an asset, or a decrease in a liability. If the value is an add-back of a non-cash expense or loss, decrease in an asset, or an increase in a liability and EquityInUnremittedEarningsFromSubsidiary is the correct concept, input a negative value. In this case the company has reported the child concept EquityInUnremittedEarningsFromSubsidiary multiple times with alternative weights.
Rule Element Id:7488 Rule version: 24.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/765207/000076520722000010/0000765207-22-000010-xbrl.zip/fnlc-20211231.htm 4

property.name: label
property.value: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
